meanings.sent1: The store had many wanters looking for the latest toy.
meanings.sent2: The wanters in line eagerly waited for the new movie to start.
meanings.sent3: The group of wanters raced to the ice cream truck when it arrived.
meanings.sent4: The wanters were like magnets drawn to the shiny new gadgets.
meanings.sent5: The wanters' eyes sparkled with excitement as they saw the delicious treats.

meanings.definition: Those who desire or wish for something.
meanings.sent1: The wanters at the party hoped for a chance to win the prize.
meanings.sent2: The group of wanters dreamt of exploring the mysterious cave.
meanings.sent3: The wanters giggled as they made silly wishes on shooting stars.
meanings.sent4: The wanters' hearts beat faster as they imagined their dreams coming true.
meanings.sent5: The wanters' faces lit up with hope as they blew out the birthday candles.
